      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void addToProductionDB(java.util.ArrayList<ProductionRecord> productionRun)
      For each ProductionRecord object stored within the productionRecord ArrayList insert the objects productId, serialNumber, and dateProduced into a new row in the database.
      private int getProductId(java.lang.String name)
      Get the productId from the Product table corresponding to the product name passed in.
      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getProductList()
      Convert the ArrayList productLine to an ObservableList and return it.
      (package private) void handleAddProduct(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Builds an SQL statement using input from textboxes and passes it to Main.exSQL.
      (package private) void handleRecordProduction(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Adds a ProductionRecord object based on the user selected product stored in lvChooseProduct to the productionRun ArrayList.
      (package private) void handleSubmitName(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      When the user clicks the Submit button, create a new Employee object using the name entered into the txtEmployeeName TextField.
      private void initialize()
      First method executed when controller is called.
      private void loadProductionLog()
      Populate the productionLog ArrayList with ProductionRecord objects created with the contents of the PRODUCTIONRECORD table.
      private void loadProductList()
      Load the contents of the PRODUCT table into the productLine ArrayList and populate the tvProducts TableView and the lvChooseProduct ListView.
      private void setupProductionLineTable()
      Setup the TableColumns to store the name, manufacturer, and type fields of the Product class.
      private void showProduction()
      Print the toString() of each ProductionRecord object stored within productionLog to the taLog TextArea on the Production Log tab.
      private static void testMultimedia()
      Method to test the AudioPlayer, Screen, and MoviePlayer classes.

    • Method Detail

      • testMultimedia

        private static void testMultimedia()
        Method to test the AudioPlayer, Screen, and MoviePlayer classes.

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        First method executed when controller is called.

      • handleAddProduct

        void handleAddProduct(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        Builds an SQL statement using input from textboxes and passes it to Main.exSQL. The input is also used to create Product objects that are used to populate the TableView.
        Parameters:
        event - stores the mouse event.

      • handleRecordProduction

        void handleRecordProduction(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        Adds a ProductionRecord object based on the user selected product stored in lvChooseProduct to the productionRun ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        event - holds a MouseEvent.

      • addToProductionDB

        private void addToProductionDB(java.util.ArrayList<ProductionRecord> productionRun)
        For each ProductionRecord object stored within the productionRecord ArrayList insert the objects productId, serialNumber, and dateProduced into a new row in the database.
        Parameters:
        productionRun - ArrayList that stores ProductionRecord objects.

      • getProductId

        private int getProductId(java.lang.String name)
        Get the productId from the Product table corresponding to the product name passed in.
        Parameters:
        name - Holds the name of the product.
        Returns:
        Return the Id of the product.

      • loadProductionLog

        private void loadProductionLog()
        Populate the productionLog ArrayList with ProductionRecord objects created with the contents of the PRODUCTIONRECORD table.

      • showProduction

        private void showProduction()
        Print the toString() of each ProductionRecord object stored within productionLog to the taLog TextArea on the Production Log tab.

      • setupProductionLineTable

        private void setupProductionLineTable()
        Setup the TableColumns to store the name, manufacturer, and type fields of the Product class. Set the tvProducts TableView to display the contents of productList.

      • loadProductList

        private void loadProductList()
        Load the contents of the PRODUCT table into the productLine ArrayList and populate the tvProducts TableView and the lvChooseProduct ListView.

      • getProductList

        private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getProductList()
        Convert the ArrayList productLine to an ObservableList and return it.
        Returns:
        An ObservableList of all of our Product Objects.

      • handleSubmitName

        void handleSubmitName(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        When the user clicks the Submit button, create a new Employee object using the name entered into the txtEmployeeName TextField. Display the username and email generated by the Employee class.
        Parameters:
        event - hold a MouseEvent.
